# Chapter 1: The Beginning

Kenji walked into the room. He was tired from the long day at work. The room was dark and cold. He flipped the switch and the lights came on, illuminating the specific space of someone who had been living alone for too long.

"Welcome home," the AI assistant said in its flat, synthetic voice. "Your vitality levels are nominal."

Kenji sat down at his desk. He opened his terminal and stared at the blinking cursor. The cursor blinked back at him like it was judging his life choices. He thought about all the things he could have done differently.

`This is fine. Everything is fine. I'm a human paperweight and the machine does my job better than I ever could. But hey, at least I have a subscription to breathe the air.`

The pod hummed in the corner. Green gel sloshed inside it like a promise he hadn't decided to keep yet.
